description: Number of partitions of n into parts not of form 4k+2, 12k, 12k+1 or 12k-1.
comments: Case k=3,i=1 of Gordon/Goellnitz/Andrews Theorem.Also number of partitions in which no odd part is repeated, with no part of size less than or equal to 2 and where differences between parts at distance 2 are greater than 1 when the larger part is odd and greater than 2 when the larger part is even.Euler transform of period 12 sequence [0,0,1,1,1,0,1,1,1,0,0,0,...]. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 28 2004
references: G. E. Andrews, The Theory of Partitions, Addison-Wesley, 1976, p. 114.
